title.rendered: FP Markets Earns Top Honors for Commissions & Fees, Algo Trading, and MetaTrader Usage

content.rendered:
FP Markets, a leader in the Forex and CFD industry for nearly two decades, consistently meets the trading and investing needs of its clientele. This commitment to excellence has been recognized at the Forexbrokers.com 2024 Awards on January 23, where FP Markets received Best-In-Class awards in several distinguished categories for multiple years in a row:

– Commissions and Fees (4th consecutive year)
– MetaTrader (4th consecutive year)
– Algo Trading (3rd consecutive year)

These accolades reinforce FP Markets’ status as a leading broker known for competitive pricing and advanced technology, particularly in supporting algorithmic traders. The brokerage offers a variety of Trading Accounts designed to suit the needs of both active traders and those with a long-term investment focus.

Craig Allison, CEO of FP Markets, remarked on the achievement: “Earning this consistent recognition highlights our team’s unwavering dedication and commitment. We take pride in being a broker that genuinely understands its traders and investors, offering them not just competitive pricing but also access to premier Trading Platforms like MetaTrader, cTrader, and our recent partnership with TradingView, backed by our 24/7 Multilingual Customer Support Team. It’s why traders continue to choose FP Markets.”

Forexbrokers.com, founded in 2016, serves as an essential resource for traders and investors seeking impartial Forex Broker reviews. With nearly 200,000 words of research and over 8 million views, it’s the leading broker comparison website. In a market that values regulated and transparent brokerage services, Forexbrokers.com delivers thorough, unbiased reviews of international Forex brokers through its data-driven methodology, highlighting top global industry players.

FP Markets provides access to more than 10,000 trading instruments, including CFDs on Forex, Indices, Commodities, Stocks, ETFs, Bonds, and Digital Currencies. Available on advanced platforms such as MT4, MT5, cTrader, TradingView, and Iress for both iOS and Android, FP Markets has identified the essential factors that empower traders to trade with confidence: consistently tight spreads, rapid execution, a broad range of products, and exceptional customer support over the past 19 years.

Notes to Editors

About FP Markets:

– FP Markets is a Multi-Regulated Forex and CFD Broker with over 18 years of industry experience.
– The broker offers one of the most competitive interbank Forex spreads, starting from 0.0 pips.
– Traders have access to leading powerful online trading platforms, including FP Markets’ Mobile App, MetaTrader 4, MetaTrader 5, WebTrader, cTrader, TradingView, and Iress.
– Recognized for outstanding 24/7 multilingual customer service, FP Markets has been awarded “The Highest Overall Client Satisfaction Award” by Investment Trends for five consecutive years.
– FP Markets has received the “Best Global Forex Value Broker” award for five consecutive years (2019-2023) at the Global Forex Awards.
– The broker has been honored as the “Best Forex Broker – Europe” and “Best Forex Partners Programme – Asia” at the Global Forex Awards in 2022 and 2023.
– FP Markets won “Best Trade Execution” at the Ultimate Fintech Awards 2022 and was named “Best CFD Broker in Africa” at the FAME Awards 2023.
– At the Ultimate Fintech Awards APAC 2023, FP Markets received awards for “Best Trade Execution” and “Most Transparent Broker.”
